mapper.select:
select
from wx_user_info where 1=1
and job_num like concat('%',#{jobNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and wx_nickname like concat('%',#{wxNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
limit #{startSize},#{endSize}

select count(1) from wx_user_info where 1=1
and job_num like concat('%',#{jobNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and wx_nickname like concat('%',#{wxNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
